<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cloned Die may have address attributes relocated to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// totally unrelated value. This can happen:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - If high&#95;pc is an address (Dwarf version == 2), then it might have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     relocated to a totally unrelated value (because the end address in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     object file might be start address of another function which got moved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     independently by the linker).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - If address relocated in an inline&#95;subprogram that happens at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     beginning of its inlining function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  To avoid above cases and to not apply relocation twice (in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  applyValidRelocs and here), read address attribute from InputDIE and apply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Info.PCOffset here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;DWARFFormValue&gt; AddrAttribute =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a0ef0e422c431e97a439e9041c06c9caf">InUnit</a>.find(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a8ecc8aaf62d09e944d05a9c4e05e908e">InputDieEntry</a>, AttrSpec.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration/attributespec/#a334610a585463d47be91041e10e9ba7a">Attr</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AddrAttribute)</span></CodeLine>
